name: Adventures Of Pipi
description: You play as an alien Pipi, whose ship was wrecked on the planet Vapeland. Escape from the Vapeland planet and collect as many vapes and spinners as...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP\Vista\7\8\10 Processor: 1.2 Ghz+ Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 256 MB Storage: 50 MB available space Additional Notes: minimum 1280x720 screen resolution
